power.title: Acid Arrow
power.fluff: You call out an arcane word and fire an arrow of green, glowing liquid that burst against your foe and sends out a spray of sizzling acid

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier acid damage, and the target is seared by acid (save ends).
While it is seared, the target takes ongoing 5 acid damage and has a penalty to attack rolls equal to one-half your Constitution modifier (minimum -1 penalty).

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: The target takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to one-half your Constitution modifier until the end of its next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 acid damage (save ends).

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make the secondary attack.

section.name: Secondary Target:
section.text: Each creature in the burst other than the primary target

section.name: Attack:
section.range: burst 1 centered on the primary target
section.target: each creature in the burst other than the primary target
section.text: Intelligence vs Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier acid damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage (save ends).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

power.title: Bewitching Charm
power.fluff: You chant the twisting words of the bewitching charm, lulling your foes into a waking dream

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: The target is dazed (save ends).

section.name: First Failed Saving Throw:
section.text: The target is instead both dazed and immobilized (save ends).

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of its next turn.

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: The target cannot make reactive strikes until the start of its next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target cannot make reactive strikes until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Charm of Forbiddance
power.fluff: Your voice tremulous, you invoke the charm of forbiddance on your enemy, tormenting its mind with each attack it makes against you or your allies

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will
You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll if the target has attacked you since the end of your previous turn

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is under a charm of forbiddance (save ends).

While under the charm, the target takes psychic damage equal to your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus each time it hits or misses you or one of your allies. Each additional ally that the target hits or misses with the same attack beyond the first increases the damage by 2, and the target takes the damage after the action has been resolved.

power.title: Flaming Sphere
power.fluff: You conjure a rolling ball of fire and control where it goes

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure a Medium flaming sphere in an unoccupied square within range. The sphere occupies its square, and it lasts until the end of your next turn. When the sphere appears, you immediately make the Scorch Attack without spending an action.

Any creature that starts its turn adjacent to the sphere takes fire damage equal to 4 + your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. While the sphere remains, you can use the Scorch Attack and the following action at-will:

section.name: Move Action:
section.text: You move the sphere up to 6 squares.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The sphere persist until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Attack:
section.target: one creature adjacent to the sphere
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

power.title: Fountain of Flame
power.fluff: You weave a fiery pillar that spins like a top and, with each revolution, it douses your enemies with searing heat

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of spinning flames that lasts until the end of the encounter.
Any enemy that enters the zone or ends its turn there takes fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. An enemy can take this damage only once per turn.

power.title: Freezing Cloud
power.fluff: You launch an icy pellet from your hand that explodes in a cloud of icy mist

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier cold damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of icy mist that lasts until the end of your next turn.

Any creature that enters the zone or starts its turn there takes cold damage equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

section.name: Minor Action:
section.text: The zone immediately disappears, as if its duration had ended.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Grease
power.fluff: Slippery oil floods the ground under your foes, sending them tumbling down or sliding around

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of slick grease on all surfaces until the end of the encounter.
Affected surfaces are difficult terrain.
While the zone remains, you can use the Grease Attack action, using any square in the zone as the origin square.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: A creature enters the zone

section.name: Attack:
section.target: the triggering creature in the burst
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: You knock the target prone.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You slide the target 2 squares.
Sliding the target out of the zone and back into it does not trigger this attack again.

power.title: Horrid Whispers
power.fluff: Your enemies are seemingly beset by dreadful noises and, desperate to find the source, their offense becomes distracted

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d4 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is beset by noises (save ends).
While it is beset, the target is slowed and takes a -2 penalty to all attack rolls.

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: The target is knocked prone.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target is beset by noises until the end of its next turn.
While it is beset, the target is slowed and takes a -2 penalty to all attack rolls.

power.title: Phantom Chasm
power.fluff: Your enemies shriek in terror as, at least in their mind's eye, a bottomless pit opens beneath their feet

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target falls prone and is immobilized until the end of its next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target falls prone.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of an illusory pit until the end of the encounter.
Enemies will evoid entering the zone by walking, though they might jump or fly over it.
Any enemy that enters the zone while on the ground falls prone, and the zone is now difficult terrain for that enemy instead of something it avoids.

power.title: Ray of Fatigue
power.fluff: A pale gray beam leaps from your fingertip and drains strength from your foe

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude
You have combat advantage against the target if it is bloodied

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier necrotic damage, and the target is weakened (save ends).

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target takes a penalty to the first saving throw it makes against this effect. The penalty equals your Wisdom modifier (minimum -1 penalty).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target is weakened until the end of its next turn.

power.title: Rolling Thunder
power.fluff: Elemental thunder tumbles through your foes and knocks them about

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage, and you slide the target 3 squares.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure a thunderball in 1 square within each target's space until the end of your next turn. A thunderball does not occupy a square, and can be moved to an enemy's space.
While a thunderball remains, you can use the Thunder Snap attack, using either thunderball as the point of origin, and the following action:

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: Each thunderball persists until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Sustain Move:
section.text: You move one or both thunderballs up to a total of 7 squares, split however you want. Each thunderball persists until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: A creature moves out of the thunderball's square

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes thunder damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.
You can either slide the target a number of squares equal to one-half your Constitution modifier (minimum 1) or move the thunderball a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Sleep
power.fluff: You exert your will against your foes, seeking to overwhelm them with a tide of magical weariness

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: The target is severely sleepy (save ends).
While sleepy, the target is slowed and grants combat advantage. It also takes a penalty to triggered attack rolls equal to your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: The target takes a penalty to triggered attack rolls equal to your Charisma modifier.

section.name: First Failed Saving Throw:
section.text: The target is unconscious instead of slowed.

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: The target is dazed until the end of its next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target is slowed (save ends).

power.title: Slimy Transmutation
power.fluff: A billowing cloud of greenish fog surrounds your foe and, when the fog dissipates, your enemy is gone and an ugly toad stands in his place

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: The target turns into a Tiny toad (save ends).

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target takes a penalty to the first saving throw it makes against this effect equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum -1 penalty).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target turns into a Tiny toad until the end of its next turn.

As a toad, the target is dazed, and the only actions it can take are walk and step. It takes a -2 penalty to Fortitude, and melee attacks against it can score a critical hit on a natural roll of 19 or 20.
All of the target's equipment transforms with it. If it takes damage from any source, this effect ends.

power.title: Spirit Rend
power.fluff: You weave a dire spell that tears at your enemies' spirit and holds the undead at bay

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit (non-undead):
section.text: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier necrotic damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).

section.name: Hit (undead):
section.text: The target takes a free reaction to move its speed to a square as far away from you as it can, and is dazed (save ends).

section.name: Miss (non-undead):
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Miss (undead):
section.text: The target grants combat advantage and cannot take triggered actions until the end of its next turn.

power.title: Summon Dretch
power.fluff: A nauseating stench and puff of brimstone herald the arrival of a loathsome, drooling dretch

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You summon a Small dretch in an unoccupied space within range.
The dretch remains until the end of the encounter, or until you take a minor action to dismiss it.
If the dretch is reduced to 0 hit points or less, it disappears and you lose a healing surge.

power.title: Summon Dust Devil
power.fluff: Loose objects skitter about as the air whips around, coalescing into a whirling elemental

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You summon a Small dust devil in an unoccupied space within range.
The dust devil remains until the end of the encounter, or until you take a minor action to dismiss it.
If the dust devil is reduced to 0 hit points or less, it disappears and you lose a healing surge.

power.title: Summon Fire Warrior
power.fluff: A soldier of flame strides through a planar veil, lifting a shimmering weapon above its head as it moves to attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You summon a Medium fire warrior in an unoccupied space within range.
The fire warrior remains until the end of the encounter, or until you take a minor action to dismiss it.
If the fire warrior is reduced to 0 hit points or less, it disappears and you lose a healing surge.

power.title: Summon Shambling Cadavers
power.fluff: With a small motion, you call up rotting cadavers to rise from the ground and start shuffling forward with their arms stretched towards your foes

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You summon three Medium shambling cadavers in unoccupied spaces within range.
The shambling cadavers remain until the end of the encounter, or until you take a minor action to dismiss one or more of them.

When you give a command to a shambling cadaver, you can choose to give the same command to all the cadavers you have summoned. If the command is to attack, each shambler can attack a different target.
If a shambling cadaver is reduced to 0 hit points or less, it disappears and you lose a healing surge.

power.title: Watery Sphere
power.fluff: A single water droplet expands to overtake your enemies, trapping them inside an enormous watery sphere

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: The target becomes trapped by the water (save ends).
While trapped, the target is immobilized, and grants combat advantage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You must slide the target up to 3 squares to a space adjacent to the burst.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of water that lasts until the end of your next turn.
The zone is difficult terrain, and it grants partial cover to creatures on opposite sides of it or for ranged and melee attacks from inside the zone to outside of it.

section.name: Move Action:
section.text: You move the zone up to 3 squares.
Any creatures trapped by the water move with the zone. You slide each creature 1 square for each square you move the zone, ending the slide inside the zone's new location.

section.name: Immediate Interrupt:
section.text: Trigger: A creature enters the zone or starts its turn there; You make this power's attack against the triggering creature.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Wind Blade
power.fluff: The moaning wind becomes a shrill whistle as you turn it into a blade perfect for slashing through your foes

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure a blade of solid wind in an unoccupied square within range. The blade occupies its square, and lasts until the end of your next turn.
Enemies adjacent to the blade grant combat advantage.
When the blade appears, you make the Wind Slash attack without spending an action. While the blade remains, you can use the Wind Slash attack at-will.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The blade persists until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Sustain Move:
section.text: You move the blade to a square within 5 squares of you. The blade persists until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you can slide the target up to 2 squares.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You can slide the target up to 1 square.

power.title: Wizard's Fury
power.fluff: You begin to fling force bolts with a flick of your wrist

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must know the force projectile or magic missile first-level at-will attack power.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of encounter, you can use either your force projectile or your magic missile power as a minor action once per turn.
